name: SmartHolidayLights
0:
”Alexa, tell smart holiday lights white”
”Alexa, tell smart holiday lights fade white”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart holiday lights
Developer Terms of Use
des: Learn how to voice-activate Polygroup® Smart Holiday Lights, our latest Smart Holiday Lights series that talks to Amazon Alexa for a completely hands-free product control experience.
